name: Kippah Run
description:
Kippah Run.

An endless runner of a Kippah flying through Mezuzahs with plenty pixels to spare. Why is it flying? Why is everything Yiddish?

And is this a political statement or goofy nonsense?

No one will ever know.

Designed by Tuval Wolf

Music by Shmona Shvarim

Guidance: Dani Bacon, Rutu Modan

Art & Interaction Class, Bezalel VC 2022
